00019 #ifndef _FFT_PROCESSOR_TO_FILE_HPP_cm130310_
00020 #define _FFT_PROCESSOR_TO_FILE_HPP_cm130310_
00021 
00022 #include <boost/asio.hpp>
00023 
00024 #include "FFTProcessor.hpp"
00025 
00026 template<typename FFTFloat>
00027 class FFTProcessorToFile : public FFTProcessor<FFTFloat> {
00028 public:
00029   FFTProcessorToFile(const boost::property_tree::ptree& config)
00030     : FFTProcessor<FFTFloat>(config)
00031     , dataPath_(config.get<std::string>("FileSink.<xmlattr>.path"))
00032     , station_info_(config.get<std::string>("StationInfo")) {}
00033 
00034   virtual ~FFTProcessorToFile() {}
00035 
00036   boost::asio::io_service& get_service() { return service_; }
00037   
00038 protected:
00039   typedef typename FFTProcessor<FFTFloat>::ResultMap ResultMap;
00040 
00041   virtual void dump(const typename ResultMap::value_type& result) {
00042     result.second->dumpToFile(dataPath_, result.first, station_info_);
00043   }
00044 private:
00045   std::string             dataPath_;
00046   boost::asio::io_service service_;
00047   std::string             station_info_;
00048 } ;
00049 
00050 
00051 #endif // _FFT_PROCESSOR_TO_FILE_HPP_cm130310_
